p: It is known that DDP-4 inhibition modulates inflammation and has anti-fibrotic effects; depending on the potency of these properties, DPP-4 inhibitors may eventually have some protective effects in case of severe COVID-19 infection. The potential decrease of the magnitude COVID-19 cytokines storm under DPP-4 inhibitors action sounds attractive but, so far, no data are available to provide a consistent answer.
